alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:34PM CDT until July 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RANDALL AND EAST CENTRAL DEAF SMITH COUNTIES... At 634 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Umbarger, or 7 miles west of Canyon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyon, Umbarger, Buffalo Lake, Dawn and Mescalero Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
